$comment: IMPORTANT: Set globalConfigPath to point to your global config installation.
Examples:
Windows: 'C:/Users/YourUser/AppData/Roaming/Code/User/prompts'
Linux/Mac: '~/.config/Code/User/prompts'
Relative: '../../copilot-config' (if config is in parent directories)
WSL: '/mnt/c/Users/YourUser/AppData/Roaming/Code/User/prompts'

project.name: PROJECT_NAME
project.$comment: Update these with your project details

agent.$comment_defaultAgent: Options: baseAgent, orchestratorAgent, or custom agents
agent.$comment_contextPath: Path to agents directory in global config
agent.$comment_maxConcurrentAgents: Maximum number of agents that can run simultaneously

$comment: core context contains static project metadata
Updated only when significant project changes occur
maxSize in tokens, updateTriggers define when to refresh
active context contains dynamic current state
Updated frequently during work
Larger maxSize because it changes often
Retention policies for different item types
type: jsonl is more efficient for streaming
useContextVS: use VS Code context management if available (Enterprise/Pro)
priority: when storage limit reached, delete in this order

security.$comment_approvalRequired: Operations at these severity levels require user confirmation
security.$comment_restrictedOperations: Operation types that are always restricted

model.$comment_default: Default model for all interactions (copilot/claude-sonnet-4.5, copilot/claude-haiku-4.5, etc.)
model.$comment_fallback: Fallback model if default is unavailable
model.$comment_allowUserOverride: Allow users to override model selection in their sessions

$comment: Task-specific model overrides
Customize which model to use for different types of tasks
Available models: copilot/claude-sonnet-4.5, copilot/claude-haiku-4.5,
copilot/gemini-2.0-flash-001, copilot/gpt-4o

mcp.$comment_COPILOT_USE_DEFAULTPROXY: Use system proxy settings for MCP connections

environment.$comment: Runtime environment - these are set automatically by the system
